title: Professional Services Agreement
obligations: Vendor shall deliver milestones as per SOW.
Customer must pay within 30 days of invoice.

clauses.title: Payment Terms
clauses.originalText: Invoices payable net 30. Late fee of 2% per month will apply thereafter.
clauses.simplifiedText: Pay within 30 days; late payments add 2% per month.

clauses.title: Arbitration
clauses.originalText: Disputes will be resolved by binding arbitration in New Delhi.
clauses.simplifiedText: Disputes go to arbitration in New Delhi.

summary: Covers payments, scope of work, and dispute resolution via arbitration.
